name: Create Your Frisk
description:
Unitale and Create Your Frisk are Lua-moddable Undertale engines that allow you to program and design your own Undertale battles. Some famous examples include Alphys NEO, Battle with a Think Tank and CrossoverTale: The Kid.

Create Your Frisk is a fork of Unitale that is constantly being updated and is highly recommended for bug-fixes, performance improvements and new features.
 
The original Unitale is outated, and over 3 years old as of this time of writing.
